name: Laser Ghost
overview:
A young girl has been kidnapped by a blue demon and to make matters worse the whole city is under siege from his minions. Good job there is Bill, Max and Carol here to save the girl and send back the demon and his minions to hell.

You and 2 other friends play as the heroes in this laser-gun shooter, 1st person perspective game where the game scrolls in all directions over five stages as you blast anything on screen with your gun. At the end of each stage is a boss that needs destroying to move onto the next stage. You also have a limited special weapon which destroys all on the screen. If you are shot or touch a monster then you lose part of a Life bar and when it reaches zero it is game over. You can continue where you last died.
